channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 1 child killed after wind gust sends bounce house airborne at baseball game
item.description: Local Maryland officials say one child was killed and another was injured after a wind gust blew a bounce house into the air at a baseball game.

item.title: Firefighters continue battling massive wildfire in California ahead of thunderstorms, lightning
item.description: Firefighters made progress Saturday against California’s largest wildfire of the year ahead of expected thunderstorms.

item.title: Chicken parade prompts changes to proposed restrictions in Iowa’s capital city
item.description: Iowa’s capital city is establishing a new pecking order for backyard chickens and roosters after some of their diehard fans paraded around City Hall with some of their flocks on Monday.
